product_name: Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: A great choice for trail adventures, the Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex hiking shoes offer the support of hiking boots and the lightness and technical features of approach shoes. Suede leather uppers with Cordura(R) nylon accents feature full Kevlar(R) rands for superior protection on approach hikes. Salewa Y support system runs steel wire along the ankles and heels for lightweight support and heel containment; supportive design makes them great for carrying a pack. Extended lacing towards the toes offers a more precise fit. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof membranes let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping you dry and comfortable. Nylon linings wick moisture away from the feet for comfort during intense activities. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Vibram sticky rubber soles provide good grip when you're on the trail and scrambling on rock.
short_description: A great choice for trail adventures, the Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex hiking shoes offer the support of hiking boots and the lightness and technical features of approach shoes.
